text: Kuma sai ya shiga garin a lokacin da mutanen garin suka shagala, sai ya samu, a cikin garin, waɗansu maza biyu suna faɗa, wannan daga ƙungiyarsa, kuma ɗayan daga maƙiyansa, sai wannann da yake daga ƙungiyarsa ya nemi agajinsa, sai Musa ya yi masa ƙulli, ya kashe shi. Ya ce: "Wannan aikin Shaiɗan ne, domin shi maƙiyi ne mai ɓatarwa, bayyananne
